post.summary: BannerQuote returns the quote of the day.

DevShareInstanceBertyID shares your Berty ID on a dev channel.
TODO: remove for public.
GetUsername returns the name of the device/user using Android/iOS/universal API
InstanceShareableBertyID returns a Berty ID that can be shared as a string, QR code or deep link.

ParseDeepLink parses a link in the form of berty://xxx or https://berty.tech/id# and returns a structure
that can be used to display information.
This action is read-only.
ReplicationServiceRegisterGroup Asks a replication service to distribute a group contents
ReplicationSetAutoEnable Sets whether new groups should be replicated automatically or not
SendAck sends an acknowledge payload for given message id.
SendContactRequest takes the payload received from ParseDeepLink and send a contact request using the Berty Protocol.
SendMessage sends a message to a group.
SendReplyOptions sends a list of prefilled response options to a group.
ServicesTokenList Retrieves the list of service server tokens
ShareableBertyGroup returns a Berty Group that can be shared as a string, QR code or deep link.

last_update.title: last_update is used to sort conversations, it should be updated for each "visible" event

reset.title: reset will regenerate a new link

public_key.title: public_key is the identifier of the group, it signs the group secret and the initial member of a multi-member group

secret.title: secret is the symmetric secret of the group, which is used to encrypt the metadata

secret_sig.title: secret_sig is the signature of the secret used to ensure the validity of the group

group_type.title: group_type specifies the type of the group, used to determine how device secrets are generated

sign_pub.title: sign_pub is the signature public key used to verify entries, not required when secret and secret_sig are provided

v1Group.title: Group define a group and is enough to invite someone to it

v1GroupType.description:
- GroupTypeUndefined: GroupTypeUndefined indicates that the value has not been set. For example, happens if group is replicated.
 - GroupTypeAccount: GroupTypeAccount is the group managing an account, available to all its devices.
 - GroupTypeContact: GroupTypeContact is the group created between two accounts, available to all their devices.
 - GroupTypeMultiMember: GroupTypeMultiMember is a group containing an undefined number of members.

reset.title: reset will regenerate a new link
